mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.resource_type AS "resourceType", a.resource_dir AS "resourceDir", d.name AS "resourceDirName", a.resource_url AS "resourceUrl", a.is_release AS "isRelease", a.is_public AS "isPublic", a.resource_code as "resourceCode", a.is_createadmin as "isCreateAdmin", r.status as "resourceStatus", a.resource_swf_url as "resourceSwfUrl", a.is_submit as "isSubmit"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on a.create_by = u.id LEFT JOIN t_resource_dir d on a.resource_dir = d.id LEFT JOIN t_approval_record r on a.id = r.resource_id and r.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_resource_info( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, resource_type, resource_dir, resource_url, is_release, is_public, resource_code, resource_swf_url, is_createadmin ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{resourceType}, #{resourceDir}, #{resourceUrl}, #{isRelease}, #{isPublic}, #{resourceCode}, #{resourceSwfUrl}, #{isCreateAdmin} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_resource_info SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, resource_type = #{resourceType}, resource_dir = #{resourceDir}, resource_url = #{resourceUrl}, is_release = #{isRelease}, is_public = #{isPublic}, resource_code = #{resourceCode}, resource_swf_url = #{resourceSwfUrl}, is_submit = #{isSubmit} WHERE id = #{id}
